titles.title: Mortgage Debt Tax Relief Act
A bill to prevent homeowners from being forced to pay taxes on forgiven mortgage loan debt.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Hearings held.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
2/3/2015--Introduced. Mortgage Debt Tax Relief Act
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2016 the exclusion from gross income of income attributable to the discharge of indebtedness on a principal residence.
